definition.jsonSchema: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/schema#","documents":{"type":"object","properties":{"payment_request__c":{"description":"Payment Request","type":"string"},"document_version__c":{"description":"Document Version","type":"string","maxLength":20},"name__v":{"description":"Name - Displayed throughout application for the document, including in Library, Reporting, Notifications and Workflows.","type":"string","maxLength":100},"study_startup_budget__c":{"description":"Study Startup Budget - Reference only: used to drive lifecycle and workflow options.","type":"boolean"},"escalated_to_legal__c":{"format":"date","description":"Escalated to Legal - Date sent to contracts and/or budgets lead for assistance or guidance.","type":"string"},"expiration_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Expiration Date","type":"string"},"qc_start_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"QC Start Date - The most recent date on which this document was submitted for QC.","type":"string"},"ir_check_completion_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"IR Check Completion Date","type":"string"},"returned_from_contracts_lead__c":{"format":"date","description":"Returned from Contracts Lead - Date contracts and/or budgets lead passed on to next step.","type":"string"},"file_created_date__v":{"format":"date-time","description":"File Created Date","type":"string"},"require_certified_copy__c":{"description":"Require Certified Copy? - Required if this Vault document will replace a paper, sponsor-owned clinical trial record. Not required for copies of paper records from an investigator site.","type":"boolean"},"informed_consent_tracking__c":{"description":"Informed Consent Tracking","type":"string"},"id":{"type":"string","maxLength":20},"qc_complete_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"QC Complete Date - The most recent date on which this document passed QC.","type":"string"},"signature_format__c":{"description":"Signature Format","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"approval_cycles_started__c":{"description":"Approval Cycles Started - The number of times in the history of this document that it has been sent for approval.","type":"number"},"created_by__v":{"description":"Created By","type":"string"},"major_version_number__v":{"description":"Major Version Number","type":"number"},"certified_copy_complete__c":{"description":"Certified Copy Complete - Yes indicates this digitalization (i.e. scan) is an exact replicate of the paper for the purpose of destruction of the paper.","type":"boolean"},"certified_copy_complete_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Certified Copy Complete Date - The most recent date on which this document passed Certified Copy Review.","type":"string"},"approval_complete_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Approval Complete Date - The most recent date on which this document was approved.","type":"string"},"qc_passes_granted__c":{"description":"QC Passes Granted - The number of times in the history of this document that it has passed QC.","type":"number"},"review_cycles_started__c":{"description":"Review Cycles Started","type":"number"},"file_modified_by__v":{"description":"File Last Modified By","type":"string","maxLength":255},"filename__v":{"description":"File Name","type":"string","maxLength":1000},"version_created_by__v":{"description":"Version Created By","type":"string"},"type__v":{"description":"Type","type":"string"},"version_modified_date__v":{"format":"date-time","description":"Last Modified Date","type":"string"},"fully_executed_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Fully Executed Date","type":"string"},"ip_release_approved_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Greenlight Approved Date - Date when content was approved as part of IP Release Approval process.","type":"string"},"subtype__v":{"description":"Subtype","type":"string"},"initial_sent_to_site_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Initial Sent to Site Date - Date first sent to site.","type":"string"},"global_id__sys":{"description":"Global ID - This value is unique to this document in this vault. This is useful for integrations.","type":"string","maxLength":50},"in_progress_location__c":{"description":"In Progress Location - Indicates the party who currently has responsibility to act on the document. Is automatically updated by workflows as the document is processed.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"format__v":{"description":"Format","type":"string","maxLength":255},"certified_copy_passes_granted__c":{"description":"Certified Copy Passes Granted - The number of times in the history of this document that it has passed Certified Copy Review.","type":"number"},"file_created_by__v":{"description":"File Created By","type":"string","maxLength":255},"qc_cycles_started__c":{"description":"QC Cycles Started - The number of times in the history of this document that it has been sent for QC.","type":"number"},"sent_to_site_cycles_started__c":{"description":"Sent to Site Cycles Started - The number of times in the history of this document that it has been sent to the site for revision or confirmation.","type":"number"},"returned_from_legal__c":{"format":"date","description":"Returned from Legal - Date legal passed on to next step.","type":"string"},"minor_version_number__v":{"description":"Minor Version Number","type":"number"},"inspection_ready__c":{"description":"Inspection Ready (IR)? - The inspection readiness status of the content; blank until an inspection readiness check is conducted.","type":"boolean"},"informed_consent_site_effective_tracking__c":{"description":"Informed Consent Site Effective Tracking","type":"string"},"sent_to_site_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Sent to Site Date - The most recent date on which this document was sent to the site for revision or confirmation.","type":"string"},"study_startup_cta__c":{"description":"Study Startup CTA - Reference only: used by lifecycle and workflow.","type":"boolean"},"internal_signatures_complete__c":{"format":"date","description":"Internal Signatures Complete","type":"string"},"file_modified_date__v":{"format":"date-time","description":"File Last Modified Date","type":"string"},"external_id__v":{"description":"External ID","type":"string","maxLength":255},"escalated_to_contracts_lead__c":{"format":"date","description":"Escalated to Contracts Lead - Date sent to contracts and/or budgets lead for assistance or guidance.","type":"string"},"study_risk_assessment__c":{"description":"Study Risk Assessment","type":"string"},"internal_version_number__c":{"description":"Internal Version Number - The version number for a document as it is tracked outside of Vault, independent of the Vault Version.","type":"string","maxLength":500},"certified_copy_cycles_started__c":{"description":"Certified Copy Cycles Started - The number of times in the history of this document that it has been sent for Certified Copy Review.","type":"number"},"version_id":{"type":"string","maxLength":20},"latest_version__v":{"description":"Is Latest Version","type":"number"},"returned_from_site_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Returned From Site Date - Date on which the document was most recently returned from the site","type":"string"},"terms_accepted__c":{"format":"date","description":"Terms Accepted - Date the contract terms were accepted by all parties. Budget consolidation, signatures and other post-acceptance activity occur after this date.","type":"string"},"size__v":{"description":"Size","type":"number"},"ip_release_issue_cycles_started__c":{"description":"Greenlight Review Issue Cycles Started - The number of times in the history of this document that it has been rejected during the IP Release Approval process.","type":"number"},"approval_start_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Approval Start Date - The most recent date on which this document was submitted for approval.","type":"string"},"certified_copy_start_date__c":{"format":"date","description":"Certified Copy Start Date - The most recent date on which this document was submitted for Certified Copy.","type":"string"},"classification__v":{"description":"Classification","type":"string"},"rationale__c":{"description":"Rationale for Requested Changes - Summarize the justification for the requested changes. Whenever possible, please drag and drop documentation supporting your justification into the Attachments section.","type":"string","maxLength":1000},"status__v":{"description":"Status - The state of a document within its assigned lifecycle.","type":"string"}}}}
